Articles.Content: Hey guys I'm relatively new to the game. If I have say and fuel tank, a tricoupler, another fuel tank, then an engine, will the engine use the fuel tank above the tricoupler or do I need to use the fuel pipe things. Also what if I used a decoupler instead. Thank you for your help!

Hi winged_wolf, the tricoupler is fuel crossfeed capable, so an engine will use fuel from above, but a decoupler is not capable of transferring fuel anymore (it could in the demo) so you will need to connect a fuel line from a tank to the decoupler, allowing fuel to then flow through it
Thank you very much! No wonder why my fuel didn't last as long as I thought it would... also that explains what the fuel crossfeed value is! Now I can adventure away.
